about_the_game:
Go, go, go, Star Guardians!

This Schwarzerblitz crossover DLC pack celebrates the Steam release of 8-Colors Star Guardians Plus and offers 2 new cosplay costumes for the game!

  • Mono - Star Guardian White
  • Arkaneis - Final Barion (Arkaneis must be unlocked in order to use this costume)

One new sentaistic song!

This DLC adds one new song to the jukebox. The song will be selectable in Free Match as an available BGM.
  • "Golden Stigma", by Blast Harbour (feat. Eric) - Chapter 2 final boss theme of 8-Colors Star Guardians Plus
detailed_description:
Go, go, go, Star Guardians!

This Schwarzerblitz crossover DLC pack celebrates the Steam release of 8-Colors Star Guardians Plus and offers 2 new cosplay costumes for the game!

  • Mono - Star Guardian White
  • Arkaneis - Final Barion (Arkaneis must be unlocked in order to use this costume)

One new sentaistic song!

This DLC adds one new song to the jukebox. The song will be selectable in Free Match as an available BGM.
  • "Golden Stigma", by Blast Harbour (feat. Eric) - Chapter 2 final boss theme of 8-Colors Star Guardians Plus

name: Schwarzerblitz - 8-Colors Star Guardians Collaboration Costumes (Chapter 2)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: Intel HD4400
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 (4th generation and above)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT740M
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

short_description: Go, go, go, Star Guardians! This second official collaboration between Schwarzerblitz and 8-Colors Star Guardians Plus brings a superheroic spin to your matches! Get 2 new cosplay costumes inspired by 8CSG and start fighting for Earth now! The DLC includes a new song for the jukebox and Free Match.
